html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02882023-03-27HDI, CMHC
ActProhibition on the Purchase of Residential Property by Non-Canadians Act
SubjectProhibition on the Purchase of Residential Property by Non-Canadians Regulations
PrecisPROHIBITION ON THE PURCHASE OF RESIDENTIAL PROPERTY BY NON-CANADIANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the definition of control to increase the control threshold from 3% to 10%; (2) repeal the vacant land provision from the definition of residential property so that the prohibition does not apply to vacant land; (3) repeal a fulltime work condition or tax filing requirement and introduce an exception for temporary workers that enables more temporary residents to purchase a home to live in while working in Canada; and (4) introduce an exception for the acquisition by a non-Canadian of residential property for the purposes of development.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0066 Publication Date: 2023-04-12
AttachmentsAttachment
